messages.content: Dear friend, For too many people, things aren't working as they should be. Both the Conservatives and Labour are stuck in the past, failing time and again to deliver a better future. It doesn't have to be this way. We have an ambitious plan for the future of our country, where every person, every community, our planet can thrive. A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit and build a brighter future. Please use your vote on 12th December to vote Liberal Democrat and build a brighter future. Best wishes, Jo Swinson

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit.
The leaflet implies that the Liberal Democrats will work towards a fairer economy but does not provide further details.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet suggests that the Liberal Democrats prioritize giving every child a good start, though specific details are not provided.
The leaflet indicates the Liberal Democrats' commitment to addressing the climate emergency.
The leaflet mentions plans to transform mental health services, without additional details.

issues.education: Give every child the best start in life

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 1-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE.

images.caption: Jo Swinson, Leader of the Lib Dems.

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Find out more about my Plan for the Future at LibDems.org.uk/plan
